result.arabic_text: لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّحۡضَرُونَ
result.translation: (75) They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance.[1282]
result.footnotes: [1282]- Maintaining and protecting their "gods."  Another interpretation is that they (i.e., the gods) will be soldiers set against them in Hellfire.
